pr_title: 1408 & 1409 add waypoint list to route artifacts

timeline.message: Added support for TSK_GEO_WAYPOINTS attribute in TSK_GPS_ROUTE
Updated to based on jira and review comments

timeline.bodyText: Would like to see this using for-each syntax. See comments on sleuthkit/sleuthkit#1833
